subtitleNullable: Covid 19 data in json format scraped from Facebook of last three years
descriptionNullable:
Data from Facebook was scraped. The questionnaire is accessible in the English language. On a daily basis, a representative sample of Facebook users is encouraged to report on themes such as symptoms, social distancing behavior, vaccination acceptance, mental health difficulties, and financial restrictions.
Weights are provided by Facebook to decrease nonresponse and coverage bias. Daily country and region-level statistics are provided via public API and dashboards, while microdata are made available for academic usage.
Every day, about 200k replies are gathered. After accounting for the variation provided by the survey weights, the effective sample size is still greater than 100k daily replies.
title: scraped facebook data of covid 2022

Every day, about 200k replies are gathered. After accounting for the variation provided by the survey weights, the effective sample size is still greater than 100k daily replies.
